verses.verse: There is an appointed <S%H2165><s%> time <S%H2165><s%> for everything. <S%H3605><s%> And there is a time <S%H6256><s%> for every <S%H3605><s%> event <S%H2656><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> –

A time <S%H6256><s%> to give <S%H3205><s%> birth, <S%H3205><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to die; <S%H4191><s%> A time <S%H6256><s%> to plant, <S%H5193><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to uproot <S%H6131><s%> what is planted. <S%H5193><s%>

A time <S%H6256><s%> to kill, <S%H2026><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to heal; <S%H7495><s%> A time <S%H6256><s%> to tear <S%H6555><s%> down, <S%H6555><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> up.
A time <S%H6256><s%> to weep, <S%H1058><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to laugh; <S%H7832><s%> A time <S%H6256><s%> to mourn, <S%H5594><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to dance. <S%H7540><s%>

A time <S%H6256><s%> to throw <S%H7993><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to gather <S%H3664><s%> stones; <S%H68><s%> A time <S%H6256><s%> to embrace, <S%H2263><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to shun <S%H7368><s%> embracing. <S%H2263><s%>
A time <S%H6256><s%> to search, <S%H1245><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to give up as lost; A time <S%H6><s%> to keep, <S%H6><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to throw <S%H8104><s%> away. <S%H6256><s%>

A time <S%H6256><s%> to tear <S%H7167><s%> apart, <S%H7167><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to sew <S%H8609><s%> together; <S%H8609><s%> A time <S%H6256><s%> to be silent, <S%H2814><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to speak. <S%H1696><s%>
A time <S%H6256><s%> to love, <S%H157><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to hate; <S%H8130><s%> A time <S%H6256><s%> for war, <S%H4421><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> for peace. <S%H7965><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> profit <S%H3504><s%> is there to the worker <S%H6213><s%> from that in which <S%H834><s%> he toils <S%H6001><s%>?
I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the task <S%H6045><s%> which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> with which to occupy <S%H9419><s%> themselves.

He has made <S%H6213><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> appropriate <S%H3303><s%> in its time. <S%H6256><s%> He has also <S%H1571><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> eternity <S%H5769><s%> in their heart, <S%H3820><s%> yet <S%H1097><s%> so <S%H1097><s%> that man <S%H120><s%> will not find <S%H4672><s%> out the work <S%H4639><s%> which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> from the beginning <S%H7218><s%> even to the end. <S%H5490><s%>

I know <S%H3045><s%> that there <S%H369><s%> is nothing <S%H369><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> for them than <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> to rejoice <S%H8055><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> good <S%H9185><s%> in one's lifetime; <S%H9132><s%>

moreover, <S%H1571><s%> that every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> who <S%H7945><s%> eats <S%H398><s%> and drinks <S%H8354><s%> sees <S%H7200><s%> good <S%H9185><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his labor <S%H5999><s%> – it is the gift <S%H4991><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

I know <S%H3045><s%> that everything <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> will remain <S%H1961><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is nothing <S%H369><s%> to add <S%H3254><s%> to it and there <S%H369><s%> is nothing <S%H369><s%> to take <S%H1639><s%> from it, for God <S%H430><s%> has [so] worked <S%H6213><s%> that men should fear <S%H3372><s%> Him.

That which <S%H4100><s%> <S%H7945><s%> is has been <S%H1961><s%> already, <S%H3528><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> will be has already <S%H3528><s%> been, <S%H1961><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> seeks <S%H1245><s%> what has passed <S%H7291><s%> by.

Furthermore, <S%H5750><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> [that] in the place <S%H4725><s%> of justice <S%H4941><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> is wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> and in the place <S%H4725><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> is wickedness. <S%H7562><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> to myself, <S%H3820><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> will judge <S%H8199><s%> both the righteous <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked <S%H7563><s%> man, <S%H7563><s%>" for a time <S%H6256><s%> for every <S%H3605><s%> matter <S%H2656><s%> and for every <S%H3605><s%> deed <S%H4639><s%> is there. <S%H8033><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> to myself <S%H3820><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1700><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has surely tested <S%H1305><s%> them in order for them to see <S%H7200><s%> that they are but beasts. <S%H929><s%>"

For the fate <S%H4745><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> and the fate <S%H4745><s%> of beasts <S%H929><s%> is the same. <S%H259><s%> As one <S%H2088><s%> dies <S%H4194><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> dies <S%H4194><s%> the other; <S%H2088><s%> indeed, they all <S%H3605><s%> have the same <S%H259><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> advantage <S%H4195><s%> for man <S%H120><s%> over <S%H4480><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> is vanity. <S%H1892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> to the same <S%H259><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> from the dust <S%H6083><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> to the dust. <S%H6083><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> that the breath <S%H7307><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> ascends <S%H5927><s%> upward <S%H4605><s%> and the breath <S%H7307><s%> of the beast <S%H929><s%> descends <S%H3381><s%> downward <S%H4295><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>?

And I have seen <S%H7200><s%> that nothing <S%H369><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> that man <S%H120><s%> should be happy <S%H8055><s%> in his activities, <S%H4639><s%> for that is his lot. <S%H2506><s%> For who <S%H4310><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> him to see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> will occur <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him?
